name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing Harry, Hogwarts, and the magical world.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: Harry returns to Hogwarts and discovers a dark force lurking within the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: Harry learns about Sirius Black, an escaped prisoner believed to be after him.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: Harry competes in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament while Voldemort gains power.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: Harry faces the Ministry of Magic's denial of Voldemort's return and forms Dumbledoreâ€™s Army.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: Harry uncovers Voldemort's past and the secrets of Horcruxes.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
author: J.K. Rowling
book_detail: Harry and his friends embark on a final journey to destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes.
